entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening then changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
